message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.CY 

This paper deals with the automatic classification of translation processes, which is a task related to natural language processing and machine learning. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper proposes a method for leveraging this classification to improve paraphrase extraction, which is a task related to artificial intelligence (cs.AI) and machine learning (cs.LG). The paper also uses annotated data and experiments to evaluate the proposed method, which is a common approach in information retrieval (cs.IR) and computational linguistics (cs.CL). Finally, the paper deals with the translation of phrases, which is a topic related to computational linguistics (cs.CL) and cybernetics (cs.CY).
